name: Crossy TrainLine Transport
description:
You are the boss of the railway crossing. And your goal is to avoid crashes with trains. Control the railway gate and avoid the catastrophe.

Crossy TrainLine Transport simulator game. This game is great and funny for all boys and girls and fans of trains, railroads and train stations. If you like train conducting games and traffic controlling games, this is the game for you. With the awesome train in this train driving simulator, you will have lots of fun. But pay attention, railroad crossing the railroad is a dangerous place and collision with train can happen any time. Conduct train safely through the crossing. And you don't want to destroy your new sports car or jeep.


Main Features of "Crossy TrainLine Transport"
> More than 20 different cars - sports cars, vans, jeep, ambulance, trucks or army cars like hummer, APC or tanks.
> More than 20 different trains - locomotives, diesel machines, steam machines, modern electric trains, bullet trains or cargo trains with a heavy load.
> Nice low poly 3D graphics and effects
> Crossy TrainLine Transport simulator is game with educational effect, you will train perception and speed
> Your goal is to stop the sports cars, trucks, jeeps or vans and avoid the collision with diesel, steam or electric train on the railway!
